title: ReplaceHeader Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for ReplaceHeader transformation. Renames or removes headers from records.

renames.description: Comma-separated list of header rename mappings in the format 'old:new'. Example: 'oldHeader1:newHeader1,oldHeader2:newHeader2'
renames.title: renames

exclude.description: Comma-separated list of headers to exclude (remove) from the output.
exclude.title: exclude

include.description: Comma-separated list of headers to include in the output. If specified, only these headers will be included.
include.title: include

defaultSnippets.label: ReplaceHeader - Rename headers
defaultSnippets.description: Rename headers using the format 'oldName:newName'. Multiple renames are comma-separated. Replace with your actual header names.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ReplaceHeader** - Rename headers using the format `oldName:newName`.

Multiple renames are comma-separated. Replace with your actual header names.

**Use case:** Standardize header naming conventions or rename headers to match downstream system requirements.

defaultSnippets.label: ReplaceHeader - Exclude headers
defaultSnippets.description: Remove specified headers from records. Replace header names with the headers you want to exclude.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ReplaceHeader** - Remove specified headers from records.

Replace header names with the headers you want to exclude.

**Use case:** Remove sensitive headers (auth tokens, API keys) or unnecessary headers before sending to downstream systems.

defaultSnippets.label: ReplaceHeader - Include only specific headers
defaultSnippets.description: Keep only the specified headers. All other headers will be removed. Replace with your actual header names.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**ReplaceHeader** - Keep only the specified headers.

All other headers will be removed. Replace with your actual header names.

**Use case:** Whitelist only necessary headers for security or to reduce message size.
